issue.title: [9.0] NativeAOT work

labels.name: composite-issue
labels.description: A grouping of multiple related issues into one issue

type.name: Feature
type.description: A request, idea, or new functionality

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
This is a grouping of related issues. Feel free to vote (üëç) for this issue to indicate that this is an area that you think we should spend time on, but consider also voting for individual issues for things you consider especially important.

---

body: Explanation of this thing a bit unclear. I read title as that some internal work for making code trimmable is needed. But in the description it sounds like introduction of `ExecuteInsert` which can bypass change tracking and update pipeline will do the trick. I'm just looking for easy NativeAOT related work in this repo, so curious is this task can be interpreted as such?

I understand that I cannot just land on codebase such EF Core and "just do NativeAOT", some amount of struggle is expected. But I still prefer finding place which is easier, since that allow me work on more or less self-sufficient manner.

I think most important question regarding NativeAOT/trimming work is how do you plan to test changes? 
- Is there already some test infrastructure for that, or something should be added?
- Should this test infra to be created first before some work should be done?
- Is this something outsider can help with? Maybe the plan is just to enable PublishTrimming/PublishAot somewhere and that's it.
- is there set of specific scenarios/tests which should pass in NativeAOT/trimming worlds so this can be considered done?

This is generic questions, so maybe they should be in parent issue, don't know.

issue.title: Add NativeAOT support for Change Tracking

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
This is a proof of concept, it's still missing the compiled model generation code, this depends on https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/pull/29949

Also, while there are workarounds, I ran into the following issues: https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/81741, https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/81803, https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/80037, https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/issues/30094

Making `SaveChanges` compatible with NativeAOT depends on #24896

Part of https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/issues/29761

issue.title: Add infrastructure for trimming and NativeAOT test apps.

repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Part of #29761

Based on https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/pull/48024

The tests themselves are disabled as there are still lots of warnings that are now treated as errors.
